org.princehouse.mica.base.simple

Class SimpleRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.princehouse.mica.base.model.MicaRuntime
      • org.princehouse.mica.base.simple.SimpleRuntime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptConnectionHandler 

    public class SimpleRuntime
extends MicaRuntime
implements AcceptConnectionHandler
    Basic Runtime implementation. Nothing fancy: It just serializes and exchanges complete node state.

      • launch

        public static MicaRuntime launch(MicaRuntime rt,
                 Protocol pinstance,
                 boolean daemon,
                 int intervalMS,
                 long randomSeed,
                 int lockWaitTimeoutMS)
        Entry point for SimpleRuntime. Starts a protocol in a new thread.
        Parameters:
        pinstance - Local protocol instance
        address - Local address
        daemon - Launch thread as a daemon
        intervalMS - Milliseconds to sleep between each gossip initiation
        randomSeed - Random seed to use for this runtime
        Returns:
        New Runtime instance

      • launchThread

        public void launchThread(boolean daemon)

      • launchDaemon

        public static MicaRuntime launchDaemon(SimpleRuntime rt,
                       Protocol pinstance,
                       Address address,
                       int intervalMS,
                       long randomSeed,
                       int lockWaitTimeoutMS)
        Entry point for SimpleRuntime. Starts a protocol in a new thread. (Calls through to launch(), with the daemon flag true)
        Parameters:
        pinstance - Local protocol instance
        address - Local address
        intervalMS - milliseconds to sleep between each gossip initiation
        randomSeed - random seed to be used for this runtime
        Returns:
        New Runtime instance
